content.raw:
Thanks for your quick response. I see the files you linked in Gazebo9. I
just installed ROS melodic on a new machine with ‘sudo apt-get install
ros-melodic-desktop-full’, which comes with Gazebo packages. It does not
have the actor collision plugins, nor does it have the same version of
Actor.hh on bitbucket. Is it possible that the ROS melodic download does
not contain the most recent version of Gazebo? I realize this may be out of
your jurisdiction and will just go ahead and install Gazebo from source and
see if it fixes the problem.
content.html: Thanks for your quick response. I see the files you linked in Gazebo9. I just installed ROS melodic on a new machine with ‘sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-desktop-full’, which comes with Gazebo packages. It does not have the actor collision plugins, nor does it have the same version of Actor.hh on bitbucket. Is it possible that the ROS melodic download does not contain the most recent version of Gazebo? I realize this may be out of your jurisdiction and will just go ahead and install Gazebo from source and see if it fixes the problem.
